channel.title: One small problem for Matrix
channel.description: Well I fixed the cache problem but now this happens. how do I fix? lol

item.title: One small problem for Matrix
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“kingcobra805, post:4, topic:451079”][quote author=Redemtion link=topic=553963.msg4057962#msg4057962 date=1343154999]

Well I fixed the cache problem but now this happens. how do I fix? lol

That means your computer doesn’t have enough memory to run the server. Fix how much memory the server uses by changing the number after the Xmx and Xms
[/quote]

.> i just said almost the exact same thing.[/quote]
Just so OP can see that if he gets 2 responses saying the right thing its prob correct. reassuring

**EDIT: Heres my run.bat for matrix… maybe it’ll work for you too. @echo off @title Running Server java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms1024m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause

Read full topic

item.title: One small problem for Matrix
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

Rexxy:

Well I fixed the cache problem but now this happens. how do I fix? lol

That means your computer doesn’t have enough memory to run the server. Fix how much memory the server uses by changing the number after the Xmx and Xms

Read full topic

item.title: One small problem for Matrix
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

Edit your run.bat or w/e and change how much memory it uses or w/e

like this

-Xms252m -Xmx252m

Or you could try closing some programs. that worked for me.

Read full topic
